waypoints.onLoad:
proc = getProc()
repeat printf("\nEnter a command to execute ('q' to end): "); local name = io.stdin:read(); if name == "q" then error("Closing.",0) end funct=loadstring(name) if type(funct) == "function" then local status,err = pcall(funct); if status == false then printf("onLoad error: %s", err); end
else print ("Invalid Command") end until false
